title: Nairobi International Airport receiving an update
description:
This week, Nairobi International Airport (HKJK), also known as Jomo Kenyatta International Airport, received an update in MSFS. Serving as an international airport for Nairobi, Kenya's capital and largest city, it is one of the country's four major international airports, alongside Kisumu International Airport, Moi International Airport, and Eldoret International Airport. Situated in the Embakasi suburb, 18 kilometres southeast of Nairobi's central business district, the airport offers scheduled flights to more than 50 countries worldwide.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
https://youtu.be/Vtw4lS1I3Hg
